title: Supervision
body:
Currently I am exclusively offering my services as a board-approved supervisor. Our sessions will be conducted via videocall at a frequency of your choosing. I am available within and outside of typical business hours.

My supervisees are either Provisional Psychologists requiring a secondary supervisor or Registered Psychologists.

My areas of interest are:
  • Neurodiversity
  • Trauma and CPTSD
  • The LGTBQIA+, including gender affirming care.
  • Risk assessment
  • Disability
  • Perinatal wellbeing
  • Relationships
  • Ages 5+


Supervision sessions are generally 50-55 minutes long and are conducted via Google meet or phone. The cost of the session is $180.
